rationale: Agent identified the double charge immediately and processed the refund without friction.
The agent provided 'canned' responses that the user had already tried and failed to offer a technical escalation.
Agent followed security protocols efficiently while maintaining a helpful tone.
The agent answered questions accurately but didn't proactively try to sell the benefits of the Business plan.
Agent hid behind policy instead of resolving a clear UX failure where the user thought they had cancelled.
Successful retention through a well-timed promotional offer.
Agent went above and beyond to resolve a physical product error.
Agent explained the delay clearly and offered a small token of goodwill.
Agent moved quickly to a secondary solution when the standard method failed.
Agent initially blamed the user's internet before acknowledging a known system-wide issue.
